actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."Equipe_Completa" SET
		"RU" = '{{update_form.fieldState.RU.isVisible ? update_form.formData.RU : update_form.sourceData.RU}}',
		"MATRICULA" = '{{update_form.fieldState.MATRICULA.isVisible ? update_form.formData.MATRICULA : update_form.sourceData.MATRICULA}}',
    "Nome_Colaborador" = '{{update_form.fieldState.Nome_Colaborador.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Nome_Colaborador : update_form.sourceData.Nome_Colaborador}}',
		"CARGO" = '{{update_form.fieldState.CARGO.isVisible ? update_form.formData.CARGO : update_form.sourceData.CARGO}}',
		"REPORTE" = '{{update_form.fieldState.REPORTE.isVisible ? update_form.formData.REPORTE : update_form.sourceData.REPORTE}}',
		"EQUIPE" = '{{update_form.fieldState.EQUIPE.isVisible ? update_form.formData.EQUIPE : update_form.sourceData.EQUIPE}}',
		"SIT_ATUAL" = '{{update_form.fieldState.SIT_ATUAL.isVisible ? update_form.formData.SIT_ATUAL : update_form.sourceData.SIT_ATUAL}}',
		"DATA_RETORNO" = '{{update_form.fieldState.DATA_RETORNO.isVisible ? update_form.formData.DATA_RETORNO : update_form.sourceData.DATA_RETORNO}}',
		"ANIVERSARIO" = '{{update_form.fieldState.ANIVERSARIO.isVisible ? update_form.formData.ANIVERSARIO : update_form.sourceData.ANIVERSARIO}}',
		"EMAIL" = '{{update_form.fieldState.EMAIL.isVisible ? update_form.formData.EMAIL : update_form.sourceData.EMAIL}}'
  WHERE "id" = {{data_table.selectedRow.id}};
